0000111001110001 1000101000110001 0 -> sum: 1001100010100010, cout: 0

0111001010011011 0001001101010101 0 -> sum: 1000010111110000, cout: 0
0101111010010110 0010010101001110 0 -> sum: 1000001111100100, cout: 0
1111000111010111 1110110011101001 0 -> sum: 1101111011000000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
